Jbrown382 + carni12: It's easy. Just find that file on  google or click here: http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=5582

actually, the missing file is in iso file itself, no need to download. Path: X:MediaComposer_6.0.1InstallersMediaComposerISSetupPrerequisitesMicrosoft Visual C   2008 Redistributable SP1 (x64)

just install the package and run avid installation again.
